params.jobId: the jobId of the Chainlink node depending on the type of data you want to get
params.oracle: the associated oracle address to the API that you want to use
params.path: the path to the field that you want to retrieve in the JSON body of the response

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

fulfill(bytes32,bool).notice: Receive the response in the form of uint256

requestClaimValidationData(string,string.notice: The requestVolumeData function can be used to call any API and get the responseThe function can be overidden to adjust according to the needs,  for example if you want to get multiple variables data

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.
